laazotea.indi.androidui
Class I4JAndroidConfig

java.lang.Object
  laazotea.indi.androidui.I4JAndroidConfig

public class I4JAndroidConfig
extends java.lang.Object

A class to centralize a Handler and Context for all INDI Android Views.

Version:
1.3, April 9, 2012
Author:
S. Alonso (Zerjillo) [zerjio at zerjio.com]
